import React, { Component } from 'react'; import jwt_decode from 'jwt-decode' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import style from "./customerProfile.module.css"; export default class UserSystem extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { first_name: '', last_name: '', email: '', errors: {} } } componentDidMount() { const token = localStorage.usertoken const decoded = jwt_decode(token) this.setState({ first_name: decoded.first_name, last_name: decoded.last_name, email: decoded.email }) } render() { return (

PROFILE

Last Name {this.state.last_name}
Email {this.state.email}

) } }
